definition: everywhere/all over
everywhere/all over/classifier for actions: one time
variant of 遍[bian4]
earth/ground/field/place/land/CL:片[pian4]
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct
to blossom everywhere/to spring up all over the place/to flourish on a large scale
lit. to fill the whole sky and cover the land; everywhere/as far as the eye can see
fire beacons on all sides (idiom); enveloped in the flames of war

sentences.english: In a recent article called "Can There Ever Be Too Many Flowers Blooming?
sentences.chinese: 在最近一篇题为《遍地芳草也难采？

sentences.english: I asked myself, in an isolated corner of the campus.
sentences.chinese: 我一遍又遍地诘问自己，在校园孤零的一角。

sentences.english: The wee birdies sing and the wild flowers spring.
sentences.chinese: 鸟声溢，鸣啾唧，野花放，遍地香。

sentences.english: And now with the burden of faded futile flowers I wait and linger.
sentences.chinese: 如今落红遍地，我却等待而又留连。

sentences.english: During this period, house churches boomed in popularity.
sentences.chinese: 在这段时期，家庭教会在中国遍地开花并风行一时。

sentences.english: You must be joking. 2009 will begin with a wail, and then get worse.
sentences.chinese: 2009年一开年即是遍地哀鸿，今后只会更糟糕。

sentences.english: Transit Haoyue that world, everywhere complains Le reunion.
sentences.chinese: 中天皓月明世界，遍地笙歌乐团圆。

sentences.english: Do you think there is the rain-stone anywhere?
sentences.chinese: 你以为雨石遍地都是啊。

sentences.english: This vast territory of the Big Island made thousands of miles, everywhere hungry die of hunger.
sentences.chinese: 把这个地域辽阔的大岛弄得赤地千里，饿殍遍地。

sentences.english: I take your part when the darkness comes. And pain is all around.
sentences.chinese: 当黑暗来临，苦难遍地，我会为你分忧解劳。

sentences.english: A tourist spot covered with trash is a real eyesore.
sentences.chinese: 旅游景点遍地垃圾，总会让人觉得大煞风景。

sentences.english: When my last joys strewed the ground.
sentences.chinese: 当我最后的欢乐落英遍地。

sentences.english: Be in bead trigonometry area, resembling so ordinary small shop is everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 在珠三角地区，像这样不起眼的小工厂遍地都是。

sentences.english: palm trees everywhere and stuff. But also
Take an example like McDonalds. They are everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 就拿麦当劳来说，它们遍地都是。

sentences.english: The battlefield was a scene of great carnage.

definition: everywhere
fills the eyes (of a beautiful view, scene of desolation etc)
(of tears etc) filling the eyes/(of scenery etc) filling one's field of view
everywhere/anywhere
countless/innumerable
lit. covering the mountains and the plains (idiom)/fig. as far as the eye can see/covering everything/omnipresent
to be full of/completely
lit. to fill the whole sky and cover the land; everywhere/as far as the eye can see
whole sky
to swirl in the air (of thickly falling snowflakes, flower petals etc)/to flutter about
covering the whole land/over hills and dales
reaching the sky/for days on end/incessantly
corpses strew the field/deadly (conflict)
lit. to fill the whole sky/everywhere/as far as the eye can see
lit. plaintive whine of geese (idiom); fig. land swarming with disaster victims/starving people fill the land
to pile up like a mountain (idiom)/a mountain of (paperwork etc)/a large number of sth
